jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Role : Blockchain Developer

Experience : 1+ Years Hands-on experience working on Hyper-ledger 2.0 and Ethereum.

Location : Remote

Job description

We are looking for a blockchain developer who will be responsible for designing, implementing, and supporting a distributed blockchain-based network. Your primary responsibility will be analyzing requirements, designing blockchain technology around a certain business model, and the building and launching of a blockchain network.

Responsibilities:

• Research, design, develop, and test blockchain technologies.

• Brainstorm and help evaluate applications for new tools and technologies as they continually evolve.

• Maintain and extend current client- and server-side applications responsible for integration and business logic.

• Be involved in the global blockchain community work on implementing and integrating the latest improvement proposals.

• Document new solutions as well as maintaining that of existing ones.

Position... Requirements:

• Strong software development background

• Experience working with large codebases

• Experience working with open-source projects

• Proficiency in one of the following languages: Node.JS or Java.

• Strong knowledge of common algorithms and data structures

• Familiarity with basic cryptography

• Experience in Full Stack development

• Familiarity with P2P networks

• Strong knowledge of bitcoin-like blockchains

• Strong knowledge of concurrency and writing efficient and safe multithreaded code

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for passionate Blockchain developers who can work on one of top PoS networks. To contribute to blockchain's core concepts like consensus, governance and p2p. Good understanding of protocols and implementation details. Strong knowledge in Golang is required.

Here’s what you will bring:
• Total experience of 2 - 4 years in software development and infrastructure architecture experience.
• Minimum experience of 2 years in leading blockchain development teams, open source technologies.
• Hands-on experience developing proof-of-concepts and pilots in at least one of the block chain platforms.
• Hands-on experience in using any of the following Node.js, Golang.
• Solid understanding of the practical application of agile development methods in an Agile/Lean/Continuous Delivery environment
• Knowledge on CI/CD is a plus

Here’s what you will do
• Work effectively with cross functional teams including product management to translate requirements to code, with test teams to... troubleshoot, isolate issues and provide root cause, ensuring that the software developed is of the highest quality.
• Develop re-usable frameworks/components required to accelerate development process.
• Take end to end technical ownership of modules, develop and deliver production code.

Qualifications
• Must have a bachelor's degree in Computer science or Information security or any related field.
• Advanced knowledge of programming languages like Golang and Node.js .
• Understanding of ledgers, consensus methods and blockchains

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs_results.description:
Experience: 2.5 years

Job Description:
• Minimum 2.5 years + of experience in blockchain technology
• Strong software development background
• Experience working with large codebases
• Experience working with open-source projects
• Tech stack (must): thorough knowledge of Solidity, Rust, Web3js, EtherJs, and ReactJs AND/OR NodeJs
• Must have at least 3+ years of experience in either ReactJs AND/OR NodeJs
• Should be well-versed with advance concepts of blockchain technology

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Type: Full Time

Job Location: BangalorePermanent Work-from-Home

Apply Now

Nu10 is a Web 3 first tech development and solutions company solving complex business problems using the latest in Blockchain technology. We are co-innovation partners to our clients in their product development journeys. We work closely with DAOs, Enterprises and New Businesses from the ideation stage to UI / UX design, consulting for the choice of technology, development, getting the right product-market fit, and product launch.

We work on private, public and hybrid chains and our developments span dApps, DeFi protocols, working at Layer 1 and Layer 2 network levels.

Our teams are passionate, diverse, and innovative. We are looking at expanding our team and looking for talented, motivated professionals who want to apply themselves, learn, and grow in a fast-paced, high-growth environment.

Requirements
• Bachelor’s degree in information security, computer science, or related.
• Proficiency in... programming languages, such as C++, Java, and Python.
• Knowledge in back-end development, algorithms, and data structures.
• Advanced analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Superb organizational skills and keen attention to detail.
• Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.

Desirable
• Knowledge of cryptography and blockchain protocols.
• Knowledge of best practices in blockchain management and data protection.

Roles & Responsibilities
• Create dApps on any of the major BlockChain networks (Solana, Polygon, Rust, Substrate, Tezos, Algorand etc.)
• Write smart contracts and be able to find & fix bugs in existing smart contracts
• Be part of teams building crypto wallets, NFT marketplaces, crypto exchanges
• Collaborate with team members to build solutions based on scalable and reusable design patterns
• Research and innovate for next-generation architectures
• Create functional and non-functional use cases for every solution

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs_results.description:
Know the Company

CoinSwitch breaks down the complexities in Crypto, empowering the everyday Indian to make informed investment decisions on a simple and trusted platform. When we started up, Crypto was a field reserved for specialists. Today, over 18 million users trust CoinSwitch to learn, purchase and invest in Crypto. That makes us India’s largest crypto app.

On CoinSwitch, users can invest in Crypto with a few simple taps, either as a one-time purchase or in regular intervals through an SIP. But simplicity is not a substitute for informed decisions. A CoinSwitch user spends 27 minutes on our app—to learn about Crypto and Web3 through our educational content and understand the market sentiments through CRE8, the Crypto Rupee Index.

But we are just getting started. CoinSwitch not only plans to double down on making Crypto accessible to everyone but is on track to become the one-stop wealth-tech destination for every Indian.

For more information about CoinSwitch, find additional... resources here: https://linktr.ee/coinswitchcareers

About The Role

The CoinSwitch Engineering team is hiring Blockchain developers for various web3 initiatives. As a Blockchain Developer, you would be responsible for designing, implementing and supporting a blockchain based network.

What You Will Do
• Build strong, resilient, and robust FinTech decentralized application
• Work on Smart Contracts, Hyperledger and/or Web3
• Build secure smart contract protocols and backend services
• Be involved in the global blockchain community—work on implementing and integrating the latest improvement proposals

What You Should Have
• Deep understanding of Blockchain, Solidity, Assembly, and the Ethereum Virtual Machine
• Experience in standard software practices including clean code, unit tests and CI/CD
• Solid understanding of security, scalability, high availability, and concurrency patterns
• Ability to communicate and apply architectural design patterns across a wide range of problems
• Experience with cloud technologies
• Good understanding of Crypto Wallets and their standards along with understanding of cryptography and cryptographic protocols.

Life at CoinSwitch

We take great pride in what we do, and are committed to our mission. And we have a lot of fun while at it!

Here’s how we do things at CoinSwitch:
• Customer-first: That’s the North Star. Everything we do is to make our users’ investment experience better and simplified.
• Ownership: We don’t sport lab coats, but we experiment—a lot. And we take ownership. We even have a catchphrase for this: Think big, fail fast, and build better.
• Data-driven: The source of truth. Simple as that.
• Fun: PS5, anyone? Or do you prefer Foosball? Or perhaps Carrom? And yes, our HR team has a whole list of activities: Disco nights, offsites, gift boxes, and more!

Speaking of lists, the perks and benefits are so extensive, this space isn’t enough. Here are a few:
• Parenthood: Up to 8 months of Maternity leave and 1 month of Paternity leave
• Gender Reassignment Surgery: Be the best version of you! We’ll support you and reimburse your medical bill.

Disclaimer: We are an equal opportunity employer committed to building a respectful and empowering work environment for all people to freely express themselves amongst colleagues who embrace diversity in all respects. Including fresh voices and unique points of view in all aspects of our business not only creates an environment where we can all grow and thrive but also increases our potential to produce work that better represents—and resonates with—the world around us

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer - Full Stack (1-4 yrs)
jobs_results.description:
platoo e-solutions private limited

India

Salary (INR) 400K - 800K

SKILLS REQUIRED

node.js,mongodb,blockchain,solidity,vanilla JS,linux

ABOUT COMPANY

We at PlatoWorks explore and build products in Blockchain, Cryptocurrencies and VR/AR.

JOB DESCRIPTION

Qualifications & Requirements :

1. Good knowledge of blockchain and their providers e.g. Ethereum / Multichain / Hyperledger / Multichain/ Ripple.

2. Experience working with Node.JS, Python, Go/Rust and JS frameworks (solid understanding of vanilla JS)

3. Comfortable working with both relational and NoSQL data stores

4 .Knowledge of cloud infrastructure technology such as AWS, Google Cloud,Microsoft Azure etc.

5 .Need to be comfortable working with Linux and have a good understanding of OS internals

6 .Experience on Smart contract and Solidity, development tools for Ethereum (testrpc, geth, Web3, eth_lightwallet, etc.)

7. Total experience of 1-4 years and relevant experience in Blockchain should be 4-6 months... (mandatory).

Roles & Responsibility :
• Designs & implements Blockchain solutions which may run on Blockchain (e.g. HyperLedger) platforms and composed of multiple software packages based on Solution Architect.
• Designs and develops the architecture of the Blockchain Solutions from a systemic standpoint.
• You are also responsible for creating the technical solution architecture for a given business problem."
• Be keen to learn new technologies as well as understanding the business transformation

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs_results.description:
Requirements:

Experience in development on private and public blockchains .

Experience in Hyperledger frameworks, Ethereum, Solana, Polygon, Algorand, Cardano ,Avalanche or Polkadot with at least 2 end to end SDLC completed.

Deep understanding of blockchain fundamentals (Ethereum ,Hyperledger smart contracts, web3, DAOs,Defi)

Knowledgeable about smart contract security and best practices.

Deep understanding of Ethereum tools (EthPM, Ganache CLI, Truffle, Geth, Solidity, Ethereum Virtual Machine, and Remix).,

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs_results.description:
Role: Blockchain Developer

Job Description

We are looking for a blockchain developer who will be responsible for designing, implementing,

and supporting a distributed blockchain-based network. Your primary responsibility will be

analyzing requirements, designing blockchain technology around a certain business model, and

the building and launching of a blockchain network. Consider yourself as the full time developer

on the project. You will breath code, eat code and sleep code. If that's your passion, then this

job is for you. Have fun.

Responsibilities
• Research, design, develop, and test blockchain technologies
• Brainstorm and help evaluate applications for new tools and technologies as they continually

evolve
• Be apt at trying out new stuff, fail fast and, move ahead
• Be prepared to follow instructions while you learn
• Have the bigger picture in mind, while you focus on each small activity assigned to you
• Deliver in a timely manner
• Work with other team members and... senior management with ease

Skills
• Strong software development background of about 3-5 years
• Experience working with open-source projects
• Proficiency in one of the following languages: C++, Java, JavaScript, Golang
• Exposure to Blockchain frameworks - Ethereum, Hyperledger, Corda etc.
• Experience in Hyperledger based Blockchain will be a big plus
• Strong in developing frontends, databases (nosql), algorithms, networking, linux and, windows

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs_results.description:
Looking for challenging role? If you really want to make adifference - make it with us

Siemens Energy is focused on helping customers navigate theworld's most pressing energy problems.

As a world leader in developingand producing the most advanced engineering technologies, we improve lives andfurther human achievements worldwide, while also protecting the climate - allthanks to our employees.

Yournew role - challenging and future-oriented

As a Blockchain Developer you will be responsible for writingsmart contract code in Solidity.
• You will get to know the software architecture
• You will write smart contract test
• You will test contracts
• You will give feedback on existing code

We don't need superheroes, justsuper minds
• 2+ years of experience inSoftware Development
• 1+ years of experiencedeveloping Solidity Smart Contracts
• Experienced in developingUnitTests for Solidity Smart Contracts
• Integration of NodeJSbased applications with Ethereum Blockchain using Web3 JS lib
•... Experience working in Blockchain projects based on Ethereum EVM (Hyperledger Besu knowledge will be a plus)
• Experienced in NodeJS / TypeScript
• Experience in testing tool hardhat
• Experience in using smart contract auditing tools, such as Mythx, Slither, Mythril

• Experience in addressingData Privacy requirements in Blockchain

We've got quite a lot to offer.How about you?

This role is based at Site ( Gurgaon ). You'll also get to visitother locations in India and beyond, so you'll need to go where this journeytakes you. In return, you'll get the chance to work with teams impacting entirecities, countries - and the shape of things to come.

We're Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building thefuture, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality,and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of the communities wework in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, meritand business need. Bring your curiosity and imagination and help us shapetomorrow.

Organization: Siemens Energy

Company: Siemens Limited

Experience Level: Experienced Professional

Full / Part time: Full-time

Blockchain developers (3-4 open positions): Hyperledger Fabric, multi-cloud or AWS skills along with Kubernetes, dockers and containerization skills necessary to

get design and development done.
